channel.title: How do I let user's login with their forum account (IpBoard database)
channel.description:
Hello,
My source is Godliike 639.. I want to let user's login with their forum account, can someone please help me?
Example: It should say incorrect password untill it match information from the database, so user's have to regster first before they're able to play.
All help is appriciated.

item.title: How do I let user's login with their forum account (IpBoard database)
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I’m not sure on the exact fix but I can offer some suggestions, from a web developers point of view.

  • IPb stores tons of data like username, password, email, last active, etc. Most of this is un-needed, as you’ll just need username and password.

  • IPb automatically encrypts passwords with a type of encryption called md5, you’ll need to have the java side communicate with the database and de-crypt the passwords, or find the registration file for IPb and remove ’ md5( ’ from before the input.

  • You can find some information on which sockets you’ll want to use with MySQL, for communicating from the java server to the MySQL database

  • Java sided you have to add something in that checks the database, in the login method.

Hopefully some of these can/did help or helped you brainstorm some ideas!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I let user's login with their forum account (IpBoard database)
